content:
ART DECO GLAMOUR

TWO E BAR & LOUNGE

Two E is proud to feature premier entertainment alongside its renowned food & beverage offerings. 

 Broadway At The Pierre cabaret series: 

Monday August 20th - Join us for a very special performance by  WICKED alums Jennifer DiNoia (Elphaba) and Michael Campayno (Fiyero)!. This intimate evening of songs and stories is part of Broadway At The Pierre's new WICKED Ozdust Series, celebrating the acclaimed musical's 15th anniversary coming up this fall. The final performance in the series will take place in October (cast members to be announced).

Coming soon...The lineup for season two of Broadway At The Pierre!

Food & beverage minimum and advance reservations required for all performances.

To book a table, please visit Two E on Open Table, please contact Two E Bar & Lounge, at 212 940 8113 or TwoE@tajhotels.com

Make a Reservation
